scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run copy-pdfjs && npm run copy-manifest
scripts.copy-pdfjs: shx mkdir -p dist/node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build && shx cp -r node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.min.mjs dist/node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/ && shx cp -r node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs dist/node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/
scripts.copy-manifest: shx cp manifest.json dist/ && shx cp popup.html dist/ && shx cp popup.js dist/ && shx cp pdf-service.js dist/ && shx cp pdf-loader.js dist/ && shx cp pdf-fallback.js dist/ && shx cp pdf-extraction-functions.js dist/ && shx cp -r icons/ dist/
scripts.dev: rmnpm run build && echo 'Extensão construída na pasta dist/'
